name: Totally Accurate Battlefield VI
description:
This Is A Parody For The Upcoming Battlefield 6. This Project Took Me 2-3 Days To Finish because There Are So Many Bugs, I Fixed The Most Of The Bugs, You May Notice 2 Bugs Right Now, When You Pause The Game, On The Options Menu, You Can't Press Any Button And The Second Bug Is On The Level 1 Your Map Will Be Turned Into A Black Thing I Don't Know How Could This Happened But We Are Going To Try Our Best To Fix Those Bugs

Thanks For Your Support And Thanks For Playing Totally Accurate Battlefield VI!

THE GAME WORKS ONLY ON PC AND MAC!
